snippet.sync_client:
from seed.client import SeedUnions
client = SeedUnions(base_url="https://yourhost.com/path/to/api", )
client.union.get(id="string", )
snippet.async_client:
from seed.client import AsyncSeedUnions
client = AsyncSeedUnions(base_url="https://yourhost.com/path/to/api", )
await client.union.get(id="string", )

snippet.sync_client:
from seed.client import SeedUnions
from seed import Shape_Circle
client = SeedUnions(base_url="https://yourhost.com/path/to/api", )
client.union.update(request=Shape_Circle(type="circle", radius=1.1, ), )
snippet.async_client:
from seed.client import AsyncSeedUnions
from seed import Shape_Circle
client = AsyncSeedUnions(base_url="https://yourhost.com/path/to/api", )
await client.union.update(request=Shape_Circle(type="circle", radius=1.1, ), )
